StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAdjustedBusinessPercentage]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int AS
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID AS Recrui.ngOrgID, FISCAL_YEAR AS FiscalYear, MONTH_CODE As MonthCode, ISNULL (ABP.TC_PERCENT, 0) AS TC_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.OT_PERCENT, 0) AS OT_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.AC_PERCENT, 0) AS AC_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.HV_PERCENT, 0) AS HV_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.DC_PERCENT, 0) AS DC_PERCENT FROM [dbo].[ADJUSTED_BUSINESS_PERCENTAGE] ABP WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ABP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND ABP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND ABP.MONTH_CODE = @Month
